Secondary purpose - To reduce use oxytocin labour without increase maternal neonatal morbidity ; - To decrease immediate per-operative complication post-operative complication associate CS
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 18 year Affiliation social security insurance Written consent give Singleton pregnancy Cephalic presentation ≥37 gestational week Spontaneous onset labour Previous cesarean section Induction labour Intrauterine growth restriction In utero fetal death Congenital malformation Chorioamnionitis Placenta praevia Need emergency delivery ( fetal heart rate abnormality admission ) Contraindication vaginal delivery Patient temporary guardianship , guardianship judicial protection Patient include another study could interfere result study
